actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce the rates of income tax on corporations.

summary.text: New Economic Recovery Act of 1984 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to reduce the income tax rates on corporations as follows: (1) 12 percent of taxable income up to $50,000; (2) 24 percent of taxable income from over $50,000 to $100,000; and (3) 36 percent of taxable income over $100,000.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to reduce the rates of income tax on corporations.
